restaurants.name: Restaurant „Zur S-Bahn“
restaurants.editorial_summary: {'language': 'en', 'overview': 'Pork knuckles, schnitzel & goulash at an 1890s tavern filled with train memorabilia, plus a garden.'}
restaurants.reviews:
[{'author_name': 'Vanes Kiessling', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111871287018023765631/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'original_language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SdR6t2bYOqd7eWffLC-4be0b9zWP8zRCiueudoTQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '6 months ago', 'text': 'Authentic German cuisine, friendly & fast served. Huge portion, tasted like delicious home-cooked meal. Highly recommended for salty food lovers. However CASH ONLY, which is also quite German.', 'time': 1661667400, 'translated': False}, {'author_name': 'Aga', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104883822995938288389/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'original_language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZIU2g7-Q1v_eQUzSkjWlU9YSVvHiZkj4pz4UtY=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '8 months ago', 'text': 'Very tasty German food. Worth a visit.', 'time': 1656774596, 'translated': False}, {'author_name': 'Kai Bleul', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100809557478824410500/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'original_language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QOVT_VJd7t51oOXD6Gmkqjy-qhQfbAyRJ0Jbia=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2', 'rating': 4, 'relative_time_description': 'a year ago', 'text': 'Great atmosphere with old S-Bahn decorations. Great space at the table and between tables. Staff really nice and helpful, knowledgeable and advising for a good meal. Good choice of dishes and good size of food, quality is good but could be better. Price very reasonable, will go again. Parking available inside.', 'time': 1645989097, 'translated': False}, {'author_name': 'Piyush Mor', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104795717097551155642/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'original_language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TwD8DSCF9HRiyucU3o5xZA_HltEtpkuKHRppqfdQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': 'a year ago', 'text': 'Really amazing place, finger licking food and generous hospitality! Really a hidden gem I never expected to find!🥰😋

Their grill teller is really nice with 2 types of sauces. I loved the green pepper sauce in particular! It was soooo good!

Many families come here with kids and their kids menu is also good! The fish fingers with mash potatos and peas looked and tasted so good!', 'time': 1640075097, 'translated': False}, {'author_name': 'Ayasta Wehr', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108111522401659145349/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'original_language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZRooM7QOpcyDFBDxfeW9qmq9bdDvVwkdIiPlu2=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '2 years ago', 'text': "Went here for a birthday and wasn't sure what to expect! Service was great, food was delicious, prices were excellent! I was very full and happy", 'time': 1603029079, 'translated': False}]
restaurants.model_input: 'review0': 'authentic german cuisine, friendly & fast served. huge portion, tasted like delicious home-cooked meal. highly recommended for salty food lovers. however cash only, which is also quite german.', 'review1': 'very tasty german food. worth a visit.', 'review2': 'great atmosphere with old s-bahn decorations. great space at the table and between tables. staff really nice and helpful, knowledgeable and advising for a good meal. good choice of dishes and good size of food, quality is good but could be better. price very reasonable, will go again. parking available inside.', 'review3': 'really amazing place, finger licking food and generous hospitality! really a hidden gem i never expected to find! their grill teller is really nice with 2 types of sauces. i loved the green pepper sauce in particular! it was soooo good! many families come here with kids and their kids menu is also good! the fish fingers with mash potatos and peas looked and tasted so good!', 'review4': "went here for a birthday and wasn't sure what to expect! service was great, food was delicious, prices were excellent! i was very full and happy", 'editorial_summary': 'Pork knuckles, schnitzel & goulash at an 1890s tavern filled with train memorabilia, plus a garden.', 'types': ['restaurant', 'food', 'establishment']

restaurants.name: Restaurant am Steinplatz
restaurants.editorial_summary: {'language': 'en', 'overview': 'Sophisticated restaurant with a garden & courtyard offering a range of seasonal & regional dishes.'}
restaurants.reviews:
[{'author_name': 'David J A Conlin', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105779619263790798384/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'original_language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TEPz5hzRaZZt7Ldi4QtVBHrpjoRA0Y12vV4f_2kHI=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '5 years ago', 'text': 'This must be one of the best kept culinary secrets in Berlin. Central in City West, but discreetly tucked away, it can rival all those Michelin stars out there. We visite for the Berliner Morgenpost dinner menu and were flabbergasted by the creativity, presentation and savour of each individual course - accompanied by thoughtfully selected wines. The service was impeccable, knowledgable and exceptionally friendly (Gina). We have already booked for two events, and will be back for lunch next time we are diowntown.', 'time': 1513694115, 'translated': False}, {'author_name': 'Beth Cefalu', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107754431793989728262/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'original_language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TbLM0aC0Cn7G4_5nabpDPbMK26Gt1LcaZ_8ih3pQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2', 'rating': 1, 'relative_time_description': '7 months ago', 'text': 'I’m not sure how this restaurant has almost 5 stars… we ate here for lunch and were one of maybe 3 tables and the service was awful.

We had to be on top of our servers for everything - water, main course, dessert, coffee and our check. It’s frustrating when the restaurant is empty and the waiter blatantly forgets to bring out your main. Our food only came out right after we asked where it was lol…

As for the food it was ok. App wasn’t great, main was good but not Michelin level great.', 'time': 1659358550, 'translated': False}, {'author_name': 'Nino Ch', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115665196501355428755/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'original_language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxanRowS1iZfJZUW-cZHaDQ1AMwOjgG-RUhGN2z_=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo', 'rating': 2, 'relative_time_description': '7 months ago', 'text': 'Unfortunately, neither the taste nor the service matches the presentation of the dish. Seems like they are lost in between average restaurants and Michelin star worthy ones. The menu is overly random, most dishes lack seasoning and any taste.', 'time': 1658434800, 'translated': False}, {'author_name': 'Cheng Chee Thong', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105213814338001772163/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'original_language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SFoeW3MXa1dm9w3trZBla8P9qAM1X8-F2-WS1NFw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': 'a year ago', 'text': 'Went there for lunch this afternoon after reading various  review  , absolutely fabulous.
From food quality  , service and price point of view this restaurant is definitely our best found in Berlin so far.', 'time': 1635987659, 'translated': False}, {'author_name': 'john axelrod', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116552228882116982974/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'original_language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Q77ssF8GZ-BjCYFz9tuFc74lAvJzu7iSHR1MnQOEY=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo', 'rating': 1, 'relative_time_description': '3 years ago', 'text': 'I am sorry to write you about a miserable customer service experience with the Hotel Am Steinplatz in Berlin, an autograph collection Bonvoy hotel.

The service has been horrible.  The real matter started with the restaurant putting cilantro/coriander in multiple dishes on the menu.  While this allergy Is not like peanuts or shrimp many people do have an allergy including myself .

The restaurant neither indicated on the menu that coriander was used in the dishes I ordered but the service staff did not ask either. And the restaurant not only did not inform or ask about allergens but blamed me for not informing the restaurant.   The waitstaff has the audacity to say in Germany it is expected the customer informs the restaurant.  I can assure you that is not the case.  And the customer should be right.

So much for any positive reviews.  I advise everyone who has taste (or any food allergies) to avoid the Restaurant Am Steinplatz like the plague!', 'time': 1571430724, 'translated': False}]

accompanied by thoughtfully selected wines. the service was impeccable, knowledgable and exceptionally friendly (gina). we have already booked for two events, and will be back for lunch next time we are diowntown.', 'review1': "i'm not sure how this restaurant has almost 5 stars... we ate here for lunch and were one of maybe 3 tables and the service was awful. we had to be on top of our servers for everything - restaurants.name: Restaurant Nolle
restaurants.editorial_summary: {'language': 'en', 'overview': 'Homestyle dishes at a bistro with an old-world vibe, an arched ceiling & a shady courtyard.'}
restaurants.reviews: [{'author_name': 'Greig Stuart Torpey', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116883444649967471754/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'original_language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QCZdJOIN4_63eN4-MVdI95v3lhNGmfOhM3e8-AKg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4', 'rating': 4, 'relative_time_description': 'a year ago', 'text': 'Lovely authentic Germany restaurant in a beautiful setting. The food was hearty and delicious, very quick service and tasted fresh. Our waiter was incredible, very attentive and accommodating. Lively atmosphere when we were there with most tables full. Would recommend for a good hearty German meal.', 'time': 1637749954, 'translated': False}, {'author_name': 'Christina Kang', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103379058654228735660/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'original_language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QzvMfAHLmU7pczA1MKJqVz1mvoBlKCfS8kC4F0=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5', 'rating': 4, 'relative_time_description': 'a year ago', 'text': 'Nice German restaurant just below the friedrichst. train station. The price is very reasonable too!', 'time': 1641065030, 'translated': False}, {'author_name': 'Mek Sri', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105181823226317448462/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'original_language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZa99r7vCFV_gbMgW8-0nmiCzkkodSp91qtCgJWrQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '2 months ago', 'text': "This 'Salmon Fillet Fried' dish was such a delight. The interior of the restaurant was beautiful too!", 'time': 1672475108, 'translated': False}, {'author_name': 'Yijing Yang', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116490515242756198105/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'original_language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxapOSB7lxksSaoFaZ-Q69Z9hZwdukyUPPKhzm8d=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3', 'rating': 4, 'relative_time_description': '4 months ago', 'text': 'Decent food and very reasonable price. Services were very slow and we were served the wrong dish at first.', 'time': 1665943194, 'translated': False}, {'author_name': 'Matias Sametband', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100270040214820145389/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'original_language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RUAoH3fWSLFihhoe1KGndpHYSeQLaowZz-_Df_YA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': 'a month ago', 'text': 'Superb location and atmosphere, very pleasant and professional service. restaurants.name: Restaurant Daheim
restaurants.editorial_summary: {'language': 'en', 'overview': 'Relaxed establishment featuring traditional, hearty dishes, plus wood beams & a terrace.'}
restaurants.reviews:
[{'author_name': 'Sarah Tran', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106523354524119951968/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'original_language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QylnrlmKemQCNkSYw7RoCPXbEU-70PGtQ9bnKAJA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '2 months ago', 'text': 'My German friend took me here for an early Christmas dinner. It’s such a cozy restaurant feels like home, with delicious food. Absolutely love the taste.', 'time': 1671115583, 'translated': False}, {'author_name': 'Carey Pearson', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106950667688671371885/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'original_language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QTqsaJfscd_SwZC7CRJTSQJohqLqdkiTI2FtZ6=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '4 months ago', 'text': 'Lovely little German restaurant in Prenzlauerberg. Dog and child friendly. We had excellent friendly service from all staff members, a little parking spot for our stroller, water and treats for our dog.

Can’t agree with reviews saying the restaurant isn’t cozy, we visited on a chilly October Sunday for lunch and really enjoyed ourselves.

Traditional German food, many options and everything we had was delicious and always brought to our table with a smile. We will be back!', 'time': 1665317079, 'translated': False}, {'author_name': 'Jasper Gneiting', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111931046739224531137/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'original_language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TqbW_phU4qNEAzDC4QdAOkmn9V42zzcHpoD8vycA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '6 months ago', 'text': 'Delicious German food, well worth a visit.', 'time': 1660500170, 'translated': False}, {'author_name': 'Familie Hong', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111503731407547819851/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'original_language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZDSyubn7dhuPqZoiVvX-CJRctAS66efXWv1MDl=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5', 'rating': 4, 'relative_time_description': '3 years ago', 'text': 'German food for the locals, with very nice service. The portions were generous. The selection was large - typical German dishes and some inspired by Austria. When we were there, they had very nice seasonal mushroom menu in August. Plenty of space outdoors and indoors. The only annoying thing was flies and wasps, but that belongs to this season.', 'time': 1566713027, 'translated': False}, {'author_name': 'Olga Lukashova', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107122195294971521665/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'original_language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RKIMrBedNs8_Cb5q_AAaUY_ktSlYiAR8KXXD1VGg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo', 'rating': 3, 'relative_time_description': '4 months ago', 'text': 'In general, not bad. Personal was very nice. However unfortunately the food came cold (in particular Haxe), seems like it was heated.. and in general tasted just ok for the price.', 'time': 1665344293, 'translated': False}]
restaurants.model_input: 'review0': "my german friend took me here for an early christmas dinner. it's such a cozy restaurant feels like home, with delicious food. absolutely love the taste.", 'review1': "lovely little german restaurant in prenzlauerberg. dog and child friendly. we had excellent friendly service from all staff members, a little parking spot for our stroller, water and treats for our dog. can't agree with reviews saying the restaurant isn't cozy, we visited on a chilly october sunday for lunch and really enjoyed ourselves. traditional german food, many options and everything we had was delicious and always brought to our table with a smile. we will be back!", 'review2': 'delicious german food, well worth a visit.', 'review3': 'german food for the locals, with very nice service. the portions were generous. the selection was large - typical german dishes and some inspired by austria. when we were there, they had very nice seasonal mushroom menu in august. plenty of space outdoors and indoors. the only annoying thing was flies and wasps, but that belongs to this season.', 'review4': 'in general, not bad. personal was very nice. however unfortunately the food came cold (in particular haxe), seems like it was heated.. and in general tasted just ok for the price.', 'editorial_summary': 'Relaxed establishment featuring traditional, hearty dishes, plus wood beams & a terrace.', 'types': ['restaurant', 'food', 'establishment']

restaurants.name: Lahn-Eck Berlin Das gemütliche Schank und Speiselokal
restaurants.editorial_summary: {'language': 'en', 'overview': 'Generous portions of classic dishes & pints of beer are served in this traditional tavern.'}

restaurants.name: Restaurant Marjellchen
restaurants.editorial_summary: {'language': 'en', 'overview': 'Cozy eatery with wooden dado & paneling, pictures on the walls & serving dishes from East Prussia.'}
restaurants.reviews:
[{'author_name': 'Hans Schepers', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107858319694871420327/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'original_language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TuqxQ_H28yr7CQ0r2bIAoXJ4toby-7_mcBY8ltT0Q=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': 'a year ago', 'text': 'I came back to this restaurant after 6 years because it was so good the first time. Have their special shot before dinner.', 'time': 1645023114, 'translated': False}, {'author_name': 'Eduard Ferreres', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104603519620428297389/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'original_language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxaL_0mGpquuAtxVufUeQfRVh5bl3ExRaOdm-dOc=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': 'a year ago', 'text': 'Very good food and generous portions. Will come back.', 'time': 1645999808, 'translated': False}, {'author_name': 'El Mouftizo', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107670233782398469307/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'original_language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYAAq3Vy-YfTb0YdU8Zwq_kfWatAiTPFWO68smM=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '11 months ago', 'text': 'One of the best schnitzel spots in Berlin ⭐️

Food quality 5/5
Amazing schnitzel with authentic potatoes on the side. Portion sizes are good.

Value for money 5/5
Expect to pay around 25 to 30 Euros per person.

Staff: 5/5
English speaking staff and super friendly and helpful.', 'time': 1647969686, 'translated': False}, {'author_name': 'Wendy Earwood', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111298430042840142464/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'original_language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RCuE3fJOzyH6jDtewcEkDmuBpM7978D7eCPQW7=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '5 months ago', 'text': 'Delicious food. The perch was amazing and flavorful. It needed nothing to enhance the flavor. Simply devine and our waiter was great. Offered suggestions on food choices as well as drinks. Highly recommend.', 'time': 1663358168, 'translated': False}, {'author_name': 'Sophie chantry', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101556420157998516662/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'original_language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYIhOTEXiINrYPy4iCPVkamDtxE-zCrSPgYA1Iv=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '7 months ago', 'text': 'The food was so delicious , the meat was tender , it was cooked to perfection and had us drooling at the mouth as we ate ‘ the staff was lovely and spoke amazing english so we were made to feel so comfortable’ would totally recommend  if you want original German cuisine ‘ the atmosphere was a bonus ‘ it had an old fashioned atmosphere and music playing’ 10/10 would recommend ‘ they had veggie options so made it easy for my sister to find something aswell', 'time': 1659295556, 'translated': False}]
restaurants.model_input: 'review0': 'i came back to this restaurant after 6 years because it was so good the first time. guess what, it got even better. menu choices and the interior are traditional, the food is fantastic and the service is really nice. have their special shot before dinner.', 'review1': 'very good food and generous portions. the waitress was very nice and we had a fantastic experience. will come back.', 'review2': 'one of the best schnitzel spots in berlin food quality 5/5 amazing schnitzel with authentic potatoes on the side. portion sizes are good. value for money 5/5 expect to pay around 25 to 30 euros per person. staff: 5/5 english speaking staff and super friendly and helpful.', 'review3': 'delicious food. the perch was amazing and flavorful. it needed nothing to enhance the flavor. simply devine and our waiter was great. offered suggestions on food choices as well as drinks. highly recommend.', 'review4': "the food was so delicious , the meat was tender , it was cooked to perfection and had us drooling at the mouth as we ate ' the staff was lovely and spoke amazing english so we were made to feel so comfortable' would totally recommend if you want original german cuisine ' the atmosphere was a bonus ' it had an old fashioned atmosphere and music playing' 10/10 would recommend ' they had veggie options so made it easy for my sister to find something aswell", 'editorial_summary': 'Cozy eatery with wooden dado & paneling, pictures on the walls & serving dishes from East Prussia.', 'types': ['restaurant', 'food', 'establishment']

restaurants.name: Hafenküche Berlin - Hafenjungs Berlin GmbH
restaurants.editorial_summary: {'language': 'en', 'overview': 'Familiar waterfront eatery with hearty standards & vegetarian fare, plus cocktails, beer & wine.'}
restaurants.reviews: [{'author_name': 'Matthias Klatt', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100030786482299475219/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'original_language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RxylkGZZRJtapA6NktWj49ucxVE4GenMCYEm_yVQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '9 months ago', 'text': 'This was one of the food experiences I thoroughly enjoyed. 🤩 A very neat but minimalistic location, a selected menu and absolutely fantastic people made this evening an absolute pleasure for us. I have to highlight the „Fischeintopf“ (fish soup) because it‘s been a while since I have been so excited about a dish after the first spoon full. 🤤 All the dishes were fantastic but that one just completely flashed me\nbecause if something as simple as a soup makes me THAT happy I do appreciate it even more. 👏🏼👏🏼 During the dinner in front of the fire place (if you get hot quickly, don‘t sit too close 😉) and with great wine, we were entertained by our waiter with some great info and a pleasurable exchange about beers. 🍻👍🏼\nI highly recommend this place! 👌🏼', 'time': 1653817860, 'translated': False}, {'author_name': 'Kitchen Insider', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114145915668836994866/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'original_language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QrWNsaMqgHPYKUl89PUiXQw1PMGsbzW9tyy5r_LQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6', 'rating': 4, 'relative_time_description': '5 months ago', 'text': "In an area that used to be as un-visited as a psyche ward, this restaurant still stands almost alone to service the throngs that have popped up over the past decade. Recently, it's had a makeover and is schmicko like a really nice airport...yeah, but I do mean really nice...the menu skews towards frighteningly expensive. The wines by the glass may seem moderately priced, but you're getting just 100ml. In itself this gives you a chance to sample across the list. The meals were good enough, though uneven. The fish soup may have a foam that would have made it super hip in 1990, but flavour should still survive, but doesn't. Though the rouille is quite ok. The veggies are all passable, and the BBQ cabbage is a winner, even if the excellent sauces are arranged like an 80s rock stars bad dream. The dessert selection is baffling. Maybe the tiny selection emerge better than described, but we decline the offer. The crowds seem to love the place, and if you can handle the bill, you'll have a reasonable meal and good service.", 'time': 1663885504, 'translated': False}, {'author_name': 'Khaliun', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101609734529248837404/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'original_language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RNve1cRx9J6eriY7j3W5VtUBxYugvHBSbhdOmzSQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': 'a month ago', 'text': 'Wanted to have dinner after visiting an art installation nearby and found this place. A bit hard to find, but nice interior, friendly staff and affordable price. We were very satisfied with our orders. I got the vegan burger and it tasted amazing.', 'time': 1673978839, 'translated': False}, {'author_name': 'Jad Mhaidle', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110089975803671552221/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'original_language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5R27TFIvrImIJp2Iyxid-lEJB2emcf03B5NfWCvTw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': 'a week ago', 'text': 'The food was super tasty, the service was even better and the atmosphere was amazing. Highly recommended 👌🏼', 'time': 1676838568, 'translated': False}, {'author_name': 'Niels Markhorst', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109732468497472728888/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'original_language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxaBiofj8wxHFdS5IhEd0sjnvQ3-9SvTUdKgpu7K=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '2 months ago', 'text': 'Food and service is great! My girlfriend and I had dinner here and every course was delicious. The staff is very knowledgeable on wine and the ingredients used to make dinner an experience instead of just some food. We had a great time!', 'time': 1670934685, 'translated': False}]
